I need to clarify this based on the comments. Rep. Jayapal's M4A bill has no out-of-pocket costs. Sen. Sanders's bill has no OOP costs except for a maximum of $200/person for prescription drugs.   Both are great bills, but because Jayapal's bill eliminates OOP costs, I prefer it.
